short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension built with React and TypeScript to translate text/audio file in any language using Google Gemini

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension built with React and TypeScript to translate text/audio file in any language using Google Gemini
